263342.<speed=0>\n『カスタム衣装の登録』の説明です。\n<br>\n施設の人:
How to register custom costumes... You can register outfits for people in your facility... To register, you need a MyTown
facility code... The coupon will be used upon completion of the registration... The costumes you've registered can be used as
common costumes for people in any facility in My Town... However, you can't dress a person in a costume that doesn't match their
gender... You also can't dress your Private Concierge... Please note that equipment that is not registered in the Fashion Catalog
cannot be used as a costume...

263343.施設の人に着せる衣装を 登録できます。\n登録には マイタウン施設コーデ券が 必:
By using a My Town Glamour Ticket, you can
register an outfit for My Town NPCs. The ticket
will be consumed when finishing.

263344.マイタウン施設コーデ券を 持っていません。\nカスタム衣装の登録や変更には\nマ:
I have a MyTown Facility Coordination Ticket... In order to register or change your custom costume, you need a My Town Facility
Co...

263345.衣装の モデルになる人を\n選んでください。:
He's going to choose someone to model the
costumes for us...

263346.おしゃれカタログに 登録されていない 装備品は\n衣装として使うことが できませ:
Equipment not registered in the Fashionable
Catalog can be used as costumes. You can set
up other equipment...

263347.この衣装を 着ている人が 装備できない\n装備品が 含まれています。\n他の装備:
This costume contains equipment that cannot
be equipped by the wearer. Please set other
equipment...

263348.衣装が 変更されていません。\n編集をキャンセルしますか？\n<yesno2>\:
The costume has been changed... Do you want
to cancel the edit?<yesno2>
<close>

263349.性別専用の装備品が 含まれています。\n性別が合わない人には 着せられなくなりま:
If you include gender-specific equipment...
If a person's gender doesn't match, they
won't be able to wear it, is that okay?<yesno>
<close>

263350.入力を キャンセルしますか？\n<yesno2>\n<close>:
Do you want to cancel the input?<yesno2>
<close>

263351.登録された衣装は 共通の衣装として\nモデル以外の どの施設の人の衣装としても\:
The costumes you've registered can be used as common costumes for people from any facility, except the models. However, costumes that do
not match the gender of the model cannot be used... I'd like to spend a code ticket to register this costume. Are you sure you want
to do this?

263352.衣装の登録に 必要な素材が 足りません。:
We're gonna need more materials to register
your costume.

271993.その名前では 登録できません。\n他の名前を 設定してください。:
You can't register under that name. Please
set another name...

272486.衣装のモデルにするための 施設の人が\nいないので 衣装登録できません。\n先に:
We don't have anyone from the facility to model the costumes, so we can't register them... You'll have to register the people
from the facility first.

272857.元の色の場合は ツヤを変更できません。\n元のツヤに戻りますが よろしいですか？:
If you have the original color, you can
change the luster... I'll go back to the
original luster, if that's okay.<yesno><close>

272888.貴重なアイテムの ツヤめきペイントで\nツヤを変更した部位が 変更されています。:
If you change the luster of a precious item using luster paint, the luster will be changed... If I change the shine back to the
original shine, and if I remove the equipment, the shine will disappear on the parts of the equipment that can't be changed.

272979.衣装が 変更されていません。\n衣装名だけを 変えたい場合は ひとつ前の\n『衣:
The costume has been changed... If you only
want to change the name of your costume, go
to "Change Costume Name" and change it...

313374.おしゃれカタログに 登録されていない 装備品は\n衣装として使うことが できませ:
Equipment not registered in the Fashionable
Catalog can be used as costumes. You can set
up other equipment...
